subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Ten football teams in the powerful Pac-12 — including No. 13 Stanford and No. 14 U.S.C., which play Saturday — have returning starting quarterbacks this season.
snippet: Ten football teams in the powerful Pac-12 — including No. 13 Stanford and No. 14 U.S.C., which play Saturday — have returning starting quarterbacks this season.
